name: BGCSF Beacon at Malcolm X Academy - After School Program
description: After School Programming offered by the Boys and Girls Club. This program was created to fit students' diverse interests, including reading and literacy support, tutoring, STEM, gardening, athletics, Girl Scouts, cooking, and chess club Hours are M,Tu,Th,F from 2:55 to 6:00 p.m. and W from 1:40 to 6 p.m.
